title: You Must Question | A Garden Is Not For Show
description:
Marcus Aurelius was a man who did not partake in the base pleasures of his time. While other Romans saw the death and the carnage of the colosseum as entertainment, Marcus did not. While other Romansâ€“particularly rich, male Romansâ€“saw their slaves not just as property but as walking pleasure machines, Marcus Aurelius did not.
